thread.title: Equipment Finance Advisor Launches Thought Leadership Video Series
thread.title_full: Equipment Finance Advisor Launches Thought Leadership Video Series

title: Equipment Finance Advisor Launches Thought Leadership Video Series
text:
Equipment Finance Advisor Launches Thought Leadership Video Series October 15, 2015, 07:06 AM Related: Equipment Finance Advisor , Michael Toglia , Susan Carol Associates Public Relations 
Equipment Finance Advisor is pleased to announce the newest expansion of its innovative online publishing platform with the launch of its new Thought Leadership Video Series – featured exclusively on the Daily eNews Blast beginning today.Videos will feature brief interviews with subject matter experts and leaders of bank-owned equipment finance companies, independent commercial finance companies, service and product providers and more – offering their candid thoughts in interviews broadcast via Equipment Finance Advisor’s YouTube Channel . “Continually expanding our publishing platform with industry-centric content and resources is a critical component of our ongoing strategy to meet the evolving expectations of our readers. Bringing thought leadership video content to our readers is an exciting addition to our online publishing platform,” said Michael Toglia, Publisher of Equipment Finance Advisor . Equipment Finance Advisor has teamed with Susan Carol Associates Public Relations to produce a series of videos that will be featured in the coming months. Toglia adds, “We are very pleased to be working with Susan Carol and her team. Susan’s experience in video production and industry knowledge make her a tremendous resource in developing this new offering for our readers.” Industry leaders and subject matter experts interested in contributing video content for publication are encouraged to contact Michael Toglia at mtoglia@equipmentfa.com . To arrange for the production of a thought leadership video, contact Susan Carol at sca@scapr.com . Today's Other News
